HOME.FastaApprovalDesc: Cancun is back, better than ever! Over a hundred Mexico resorts have reopened and the state tourism minister predicts Cancun will draw as many visitors in 2006 as it did two years ago. And the travel deals are great! If you haven’t been, now may be the best time to take a vacation to Cancun.
HOME.OpenPurchasesDesc: Cancun is back, better than ever! Over a hundred Mexico resorts have reopened and the state tourism minister predicts Cancun will draw as many visitors in 2006 as it did two years ago. And the travel deals are great! HOME.DepositFudingAmount: Deposit fuding amount for intime max.10k SAR
HOME.ResponsivelayoutDesc: No matter if you are using your laptop or are on the go with your mobile, you will always have a convenient and user-friendly interface offered by our white-label crowdfunding software. LenderKit works great across all popular devices.
HOME.StartYourJourneyNowDesc: Get it done with minimum headache using out of the box functionality, flexible user flows, and customisable branding.
HOME.WeMadeItEasyForYou: We made it easy for you
HOME.WeMadeItEasyForYouDesc: No manual paperwork required. Using LenderKit, you can build a white label crowdfunding portal with a smooth investor and borrower onboarding with streamlined KYC/AML and due diligence checks. We partner with MangoPay and GCEN that provide excellent KYC and anti-money laundering management as well as offer high-level transaction safety.

Borrower.BorrowerDescription: We're working on elevating the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's digital footprint in the Financial technology services sector, in pursuit of the national vision.
Borrower.BorrowerAdvantages: Advantages of the purchase service in installments
Borrower.TheEasySolutionToPurchaseVariousProducts: The easy solution to purchase various products in electronic stores (installments) without having to pay right away!
Borrower.PossibilityToBuyProductsRanging: Possibility to buy products ranging from 500 - 10,000 SR.
Borrower.CalculatesAlowAndSteadyProfitRateOnPurch: Calculates a low and steady profit rate on purchases.
Borrower.WeProvideDeliveryServiceToCompleteThePur: We provide delivery service to complete the purchase department with ease.
Borrower.AntimSimplifiesComplexFinancingOperation: Antim simplifies complex financing operations, with just the push of a button you can complete your procedures and without having to visit us!
Borrower.Step1Desc: Just answer a few quick questions about your education and employment.
Borrower.Step2Desc: After your application is approved, you'll have a chance to review and accept your loan.
Borrower.Step3Desc: It's easy to set up automated monthly payments and there's no penalty for paying off your loan early.
Borrower.Age: Age not less than 21 and not higher than 50.
Borrower.Salary: The borrower's salary should not be less than SAR 5,000.
Borrower.CheckTheCreditRecord: Check the credit record in an attribute.
Borrower.HighUserRating: High user rating in the Antim platform.
Borrower.CommitmentToPaymentsPrevious: Commitment to the payments of previous installments.
Borrower.FrequentlyAskedQuestions1: Do you follow the principles of Islamic Sharia for its financial transactions?
Borrower.FrequentlyAskedQuestions2: Can I be a borrower and an investor at the same time?
Borrower.FrequentlyAskedQuestions3: What is the action taken if I default on payment?
Borrower.FrequentlyAskedQuestions4: What is the minimum order limit?
